title: CityCatalyst
login-details: Please enter your details to log in to your account
email-invalid: Please enter a valid email address
signup-details: Please enter your details to create your account
password-hint: Must contain uppercase, lowercase letters and number
accept-terms-required: Please accept the terms and conditions in order to sign up
forgot-password-details: Enter the email address you used when you joined and we'll send you instructions to reset your password.
check-email-details1: Thank you for creating your City Catalyst account!
check-email-details2: In your inbox, you will receive an email with instructions and credentials for your new account. If you do not receive it, please check your spam folder.
check-email-reset-details: , you will get an email with instructions on resetting your password. If it doesn't arrive, be sure to check your spam folder.
onboarding-details:
We need to set and confirm the city where you want to do the inventory.
You are one step closer to getting your GPC emissions inventory!
setup-details: Please select the city and year for which you want to create your emissions inventory
gpc-basic-message: Only GPC Basic Inventories are supported momentarily
